channel.title: New, need some help on where to start
channel.description: Hi guys! Well where to start where to start... I played runescape for about 4 years. About 1/20th of that time was on runescape classic. I was quite the advid runescape player, and I really enjoyed the game. After ahwile, my friends started leaveing and well it all went down from their eventually leading up to me getting banned for cussing everyone at the grand exchange out becasue I was going to quit anyway. I played around on a few runescape classic servers for ahwile but never got into any of them. I love runescape classic alot becasue I admire the beginnings of runescape and I love the look, feel, and how it plays. Now I am seriously interested in starting my own runescape classic server in an atempt to recreate runescape classic. I do not want to make a pk server, I want to recreate runescape classic. I am not much of a programmer I have done some work in Perl and that is about it. I do however have a book called "Java in a nutshell" sitting on my shelf that has everything you need to know about java. So guys how do I get started on my adventure?

item.title: New, need some help on where to start
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“cokecoladrunk, post:10, topic:247273”][quote author=bonzakid link=topic=326255.msg2556457#msg2556457 date=1227928395]
RSC community is like dead lol
[/quote]
It is? Well I better download everything I can, archive it into a hidden hard-drive. Put it in the closet and wait for 30 years when runescape is dead and all of this is dead. Take it up, upload it, start a new community, and re-introduce people to rsc.[/quote]If people don’t want rsc now, why would they want it later?[quote=“Argation, post:14, topic:247273”]i’ve recently started on the same adventure as you did. though i must admit, i do program for a living irl in C#, and Java isn’t all that diffrent.

I suggest you take a source code, and do something basic in it, like changing a formula, or sending a msg to the player. once you get that working. try someting bigger. try adding something to your code that is already on another server source, but that you have to remake. if you’ve done that, try your own stuff.
be sure to “save” your code alot, because you’ll mess up and you’re going to want to restart :P[/quote]That’s actually a bad suggestion. OP should read “java for dummies”, then once fully done reading that, OP should read “java how to program”, THEN move onto programming/editing servers.

Read full topic
item.source: New, need some help on where to start

item.title: New, need some help on where to start
item.dc:creator: @Argation Argation
item.description:
@Argation wrote:

i’ve recently started on the same adventure as you did. though i must admit, i do program for a living irl in C#, and Java isn’t all that diffrent.

I suggest you take a source code, and do something basic in it, like changing a formula, or sending a msg to the player. once you get that working. try someting bigger. try adding something to your code that is already on another server source, but that you have to remake. if you’ve done that, try your own stuff.
be sure to “save” your code alot, because you’ll mess up and you’re going to want to restart

Read full topic
item.source: New, need some help on where to start

item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

cokecoladrunk:

I thought this was a good community?

It’s better than rune=server community. They are more brain dead than moparscapians.

Read full topic

@_Kyle wrote:

cokecoladrunk:

Hi guys! Well where to start where to start… I played runescape for about 4 years. About 1/20th of that time was on runescape classic. I was quite the advid runescape player, and I really enjoyed the game. After ahwile, my friends started leaveing and well it all went down from their eventually leading up to me getting banned for cussing everyone at the grand exchange out becasue I was going to quit anyway. I played around on a few runescape classic servers for ahwile but never got into any of them. I love runescape classic alot becasue I admire the beginnings of runescape and I love the look, feel, and how it plays. Now I am seriously interested in starting my own runescape classic server in an atempt to recreate runescape classic. I do not want to make a pk server, I want to recreate runescape classic. I am not much of a programmer I have done some work in Perl and that is about it. I do however have a book called “Java in a nutshell” sitting on my shelf that has everything you need to know about java. So guys how do I get started on my adventure?

Get reading then son.

I thought this was a good community?

item.title: New, need some help on where to start
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Meth Sir Meth
item.description:
@Sir_Meth wrote:

Divine Source is a basic source for u…
Then Get Firescape Fool around with thos…

when u got some logic… move on to rscdv25

If u already have the logic…go straight into rscd

Many People are assholes hear…but its worth the try to ask for help…
I think this is the “wrong section”

Anything else?

Read full topic
